Confrontation: ^"I... I did it. I got my power back."
^"Congratulations, Felix. But tell me, now that you hold such power once more, what do you intend to do with it?"
^"I've tasted power before, Turtle. And I won't let anyone take it away from me again. I'll show them all who's in control."
^"Control, Felix? But at what cost? Consider the lives you could save if you chose a different path."
^"I've endured too much to relinquish my power now, Turtle. It's time to make them all see my true strength."
^"I've learned from my past mistakes, Turtle. This time, I'll use my power to protect and uplift those around me."

c-0: ^"I've endured too much to relinquish my power now, Turtle. It's time to make them all see my true strength."
c-1: ^"I've learned from my past mistakes, Turtle. This time, I'll use my power to protect and uplift those around me."

Bad1: ^"Perhaps, Felix. But remember, power unchecked can lead to ruin. Choose wisely."
Good1: ^"Indeed, Felix. True strength lies not in dominance, but in the ability to uplift and protect others. Embrace this path, and you'll find fulfillment beyond measure."
FinalChoice: ^"I've made my choice, Turtle. And I choose to ."
^Persuade Felix to use his power for good

c-0: ^"I've made my choice, Turtle. And I choose to reign supreme."
^"Very well, Felix. But remember, power unchecked can lead to ruin. Choose wisely."
^"I've heard enough, Turtle. My mind is made up. It's time for Foxhaven to feel my wrath."
c-1: ^"I've tasted power before, Turtle. But maybe... maybe it's time for a different approach."
^"Wise choice, Felix. Using your power for protection rather than domination is commendable."
^"You're right, Turtle. It's time for me to make things right, to face Morbius and end this once and for all."
